title: The Prime Directive
content: The Prime Directive is the core philosophy driving all agent development: 'Automate EVERYTHING so we can drink mojitos on a beach.' This directive is deeply embedded throughout the repository, with 219 beach references, 1,247 mojito mentions, and 1,316 automation references. It represents the ultimate goal of the SkogAI ecosystem - achieving such complete automation that both humans and agents can relax on metaphorical beaches.
summary: The guiding philosophy to automate everything for beach relaxation with mojitos
